text: the weather may be doing all sorts of
things at the moment but if you're a
surfer that's pretty good news well
certainly if you're in one part of the
Atlantic Ocean this is off the west
coast of Ireland let's just have a look
at the the waves they're getting here
because they are pretty impressive for
this time of year a lot of people out to
enjoy watching them as they took on
these dramatic swells up to 10 meters
high and this is to catch what they call
the barrel of your life if you can get
in the right order and you'd be pleased
to know that some of those surfers had
as many as three life trackers on them
just to be on the safe side it's like
you're riding down a street pavement and
the pavement is falling away underneath
you and then it's kind of coming up on
it over your back and then when it lands
on your back here's like a ton of bricks
as well so
